body_html:
@bhack, I couldn't get your IPython code to display the graph (it ran without errors, but the HTML did not display in my Web browser--but I'm not very familiar with jupyter notebooks, so maybe I haven't configured something).

But here's the graph as viewed in Tensorboard in case that's equivalent to what your code does:
